T02D1270:49b-1: he ru ko pa au du da ya mandala bi dhi: bod skad du /
T02D1270:49b-2: he ru ka nye bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i
T02D1270:49b-3: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / dpal rdo rje mkha'
T02D1270:49b-5: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1270:49b-6: he ru ka dpal thams cad mkhyen nyid rig par ldan /
T02D1270:49b-7: lhan cig skyes pa de la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1270:49b-8: skyon rnams thams cad bral zhing snying rnge'i rang bzhin ldan //
T02D1270:49b-9: de nyid rtogs phyir dkyil 'khor cho ga bsdus te bshad //
T02D1270:49b-10: dbang bskur rab gnas bzlas dang sgrub pa la sogs pa //
T02D1270:49b-11: dkyil 'khor chen por mi ldan gang yang 'grub mi 'gyur //
T02D1270:49b-12: de phyir las kun rdzogs shing de nyid rtogs phyir dang //
T02D1270:49b-13: khyad par lam la smin phyir dkyil 'khor cho ga brtsam //
T02D1270:49b-14: dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dang //
T02D1270:49b-15: gdan ldan bzlas dang sbyin sreg cho ga dang //
T02D1270:49b-16: mchod dang las kyi sbyor ka yongs su sdud pa ste /
T02D1270:49b-17: 'di ni de nyid bcu ste rig par bya //
T02D1270:49b-18: slob dpon de nyid bcur ldan zhing //
T02D1270:49b-19: sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes //
T02D1270:49b-20: mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02D1270:49b-21: bstan bcos kun gyi don rtogs shing //
T02D1270:49b-22: dbang rnams thams cad rdzogs pa dang //
T02D1270:49b-23: de nyid lha yi snang ba thob //
T02D1270:49b-24: bla ma yon tan ldan gyis gnang //
T02D1270:49b-25: dam tshig sngom ldan rab tu brtan //
T02D1270:49b-26: theg pa gsum gyi de nyid rig /'jig rten chos kyis ma gos shing //
T02D1270:49b-27: snying rje'i rang bzhin snying brtser ldan //
T02D1270:49b-28: rgyun du bzlas brjod mthar phyin zhing //
T02D1270:49b-29: dad dang byams la rgyun bzhugs pa //
T02D1270:49b-30: cho ga thams cad rdzogs pa dang //
T02D1270:49b-31: dkyil 'khor bri la brtson ldan yin //
T02D1270:49b-32: mchog gi bsod nams thob 'dod dang //
T02D1270:49b-33: de nyid rjes su yi rang ldan //
T02D1270:49b-34: de dag mi ldan dkyil 'khor rtsom //
T02D1270:49b-35: cho ga'i rang bzhin dman pa dang //
T02D1270:49b-36: rlom pa'i sems kyis byas gyur na //
T02D1270:49b-38: pha rol 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur de phyir mtshan nyid rdzogs pa dang //
T02D1270:49b-39: rgyud kyi don rnams yongs rtogs shing //
T02D1270:49b-40: cho ga thams cad ma nyams par //
T02D1270:49b-41: dkyil 'khor chen po rtsom pa na //
T02D1270:49b-42: 'di dang pha rol thams cad kyi //
T02D1270:49b-43: bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa 'thob //
T02D1270:49b-44: mi mnyam bsod nams thob pa'i phyir //
T02D1270:50a-2: de la dang po kho nar slob ma sbyin par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1270:50a-3: mandala sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas lan gsum du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:50a-4: bdag nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ram //
T02D1270:50a-5: gzhan sbyin par bya ba'i don ched du gnyer bas bsnyen pa la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D1270:50a-6: de nas khyad par gyi gnas so so'i skye bo mi 'du ba /
T02D1270:50a-8: gnas kyi de kho na nyid rig pa'i stobs kyis gnas te /
T02D1270:50a-9: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan par bya ste /
T02D1270:50a-10: lhag pa'i lha'am 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags la 'bum phrag gi bzlas pa byas nas /
T02D1270:50a-11: 'khor gyi sngags kyang khri phrag re re'i bzlas pa byas pa 'am /
T02D1270:50a-12: yang na lha'i rjes su gnang ba thob cing /
T02D1270:50a-13: mkha' 'gro mas lung bstan nas dkyil 'khor rtsom pa la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1270:50a-14: de dag ni bsnyen pa'i rim pa'o /
T02D1270:50a-18: dur khrod dben pa'i nags tshal dang //
T02D1270:50a-20: bsgrubs na dngos grub nye bar bshad //
T02D1270:50a-21: mtsho dang grong khyer dbus dag dang //
T02D1270:50a-22: skye bo 'dus sa phyugs ra dang //
T02D1270:50a-23: rab gnas ma byas lha khang dang //
T02D1270:50a-24: mtshan nyid mi ldan sa phyogs su //
T02D1270:50a-25: gang zhig dkyil 'khor rtsom byed na //
T02D1270:50a-26: de yi dngos grub thams cad ni //
T02D1270:50a-27: de nyid mkhyen pas ring bar gsungs //
T02D1270:50a-30: // / dus dang rgyu skar shis pa la //
T02D1270:50a-31: snga dro'i dus su yang dag par //
T02D1270:50a-32: de nyid mkhyen pa'i gtso bo yis //
T02D1270:50a-33: sa ni legs par brtag par bya //
T02D1270:50a-34: bra shing yung ba rno shing rams shing rnams ni spangs //
T02D1270:50a-35: nyung nag skur shing don grub go bi da ra dang //
T02D1270:50a-36: sa rtsub dag dang ri sul tshva sgo tsher ma can //
T02D1270:50a-37: rus sbal rgyab 'dra'i sa gzhi yongs su spang //
T02D1270:50a-38: shar phyogs ni ma pa la yi thar shing yod pa dang //
T02D1270:50a-39: lho phyogs pa la sha yi thang shing yod pa dang //
T02D1270:50a-40: nub phyogs n+ya gro dha yi thang shing gnas pa dang //
T02D1270:50a-41: byang phyogs ba ku la yi thang shing skyes pa ni //
T02D1270:50a-42: sa phyogs de dag yongs su spang bar bya //
T02D1270:50a-43: me yi mtshams su ka ku pa yi shing ldan dang //
T02D1270:50b-0: srin po'i mtshams su ba la sha yi shing @50b gnas spang bar bya //
T02D1270:50b-1: de bzhin rlung gi mtshams su pa la bha li'i shing //
T02D1270:50b-2: dbang ldan mtshams su au dumw'a ra'i shing bcas spang //
T02D1270:50b-3: aa sho ka ni 'bras med skam po skam shing sa //
T02D1270:50b-4: ta ma la'i shing tsher ma dug shing spang //
T02D1270:50b-5: gsal shing la sogs gdug pa'i shing rnams yongs su spang //
T02D1270:50b-6: mi mnyam nag po gru bzhi chu shing skyes pa dang //
T02D1270:50b-7: chu shol gang rol 'obs can gting khung gnyer ldan spang //
T02D1270:50b-8: legs par gru bzhir brkos nas de nyid sa yis dgang //
T02D1270:50b-9: sngon pas dma' na legs par brtags te spang bar bya //
T02D1270:50b-10: mnyam par gang ste mtho na sa gzhi bzang por bshad //
T02D1270:50b-13: // / bra shing la sogs sa gzhi la //
T02D1270:50b-14: gang zhig dkyil 'khor rtsom byed na //
T02D1270:50b-15: rtsod dang mya ngan nor shor dang //
T02D1270:50b-16: yon bdag gdung skye the tshom med //
T02D1270:50b-19: de phyir de 'dra'i sa gzhi la //
T02D1270:50b-20: dkyil 'khor mi brtsam blo ldan gyis //
T02D1270:50b-21: aa sho ka sogs ldan pa yi //
T02D1270:50b-22: sa gzhi dkar po 'jam pa yi //
T02D1270:50b-24: der ni bla med dngos grub thob //
T02D1270:50b-25: brkos pas sa chus ma khengs na //
T02D1270:50b-26: des ni dgongs pa nyams par 'gyur //
T02D1270:50b-27: brkos pas sa chus gang lhag na //
T02D1270:50b-29: sa gzhi'i mtshan nyid brtag pa'o /
T02D1270:50b-31: // / de nas sngags pas sa gzhi legs par brtags
T02D1270:50b-32: pa'i dbus su mtho zhing bde ba'i stan la 'dug
T02D1270:50b-33: ste / khrus byas te dri zhim pos byugs la /
T02D1270:50b-34: na bza' dang phyag rgya drug gis legs par brgyan la /
T02D1270:50b-35: dgos pa thams cad yongs su tshogs par byas nas rgyun du bsrung ba'i sngags bzlas te /
T02D1270:50b-36: sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pa dang ldan pas rdo rje dang dril bu gzung ste /
T02D1270:50b-37: mchod pa dang gtor ma sngon du 'gro ba byas nas /
T02D1270:50b-38: dgongs ka'i dus su ting nge 'dzin gsum rdzogs par byas la /
T02D1270:50b-39: ji ltar bshad pa'i drag po'i sbyin sreg gis bgegs bskrad nas phur bu btab ste /
T02D1270:50b-40: rdo rje ra ba dang gur la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1270:50b-41: de nas slob ma bsrung ba'i don du zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1270:50b-42: de nas gtor ma rgya chen po ji lta ba'i gdams ngag gis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1270:51a-0: @51a * // phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la
T02D1270:51a-1: sgra chen po dang ldan par byas te so so
T02D1270:51a-3: byin gyis rlob pa'i gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:51a-4: de'i nang par snga dro'i dus su sngags pa rnal
T02D1270:51a-5: 'byor dang ldan pa las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis
T02D1270:51a-6: las thams cad pa'i chu la bsngags te /
T02D1270:51a-7: sa gzhi la bsang gtor du byas nas rang gi
T02D1270:51a-8: 'od zer gyis ji ltar bshad pa'i sa'i lha mo
T02D1270:51a-9: bkug ste / mdun gyi nam mkha'i dbyings nas mchod pa la sogs pas yongs su mchod la /
T02D1270:51a-10: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02D1270:51a-11: zhes pa la sogs pas gsol ba btab nas aom
T02D1270:51a-12: badzro ttishtha zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis nam mkha'i phyogs
T02D1270:51a-14: las kyi rdo rjes brko bar bya //
T02D1270:51a-15: zabs su pus mo'i tshad tsam brko //
T02D1270:51a-16: lto 'phye yongs su brtag byas la //
T02D1270:51a-17: skyon ni rnam par brtag par bya //
T02D1270:51a-18: dgun zla gsum gyi bdag nyid la //
T02D1270:51a-19: ji ltar nyi ma shar nas brtsams //
T02D1270:51a-20: lho yi phyogs su mgo bltas nas //
T02D1270:51a-21: g-yon gyi lus kyis nyal ba yin //
T02D1270:51a-22: dpyid zla gsum gyi bdag nyid la //
T02D1270:51a-23: lho nas nyi ma nub phyogs su //
T02D1270:51a-24: lus stod mi lus nub tu blta //
T02D1270:51a-25: lus smad sbrul 'dra shar du yin //
T02D1270:51a-26: dbyar zla gsum gyi bdag nyid la //
T02D1270:51a-27: byang du kha bltas nub tu 'khor //
T02D1270:51a-28: ston zla gsum gyi bdag nyid la //
T02D1270:51a-29: shar du mgo bltas shar blta yin //
T02D1270:51a-30: de yis lto shes byas nas brko //
T02D1270:51a-31: des mi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ni //
T02D1270:51a-32: thob par 'gyur te the tshom med //
T02D1270:51a-33: gal te mgo bor brko ba na //
T02D1270:51a-34: pha dang ma dang snying gnyen dang //
T02D1270:51a-35: bu dang tsha bo nye 'khor bcas //
T02D1270:51a-36: rtag tu brlag 'gyur the tshom med //
T02D1270:51a-37: gal te rgyab tu brkos pa na //
T02D1270:51a-39: gal te mjug mar brkos pa na //
T02D1270:51a-40: ba lang ma he la sogs pa'i //
T02D1270:51a-41: sgo phyugs myur du brlag par 'gyur //
T02D1270:51a-42: de phyir lto 'phye yongs brtags la //
T02D1270:51a-43: skor ba lan gsum byas nas ni //
T02D1270:51a-44: lto ba'i phyogs su brko bar bya //
T02D1270:51a-45: lto 'phye shar phyogs nas brtsams nas //
T02D1270:51a-46: ji ltar dus tshod gsungs pa bzhin //
T02D1270:51a-47: phyogs mtshams kun du 'khor zhing gnas //
T02D1270:51a-48: sa brkos pa yi nang nas ni //
T02D1270:51a-49: phub ma rdo ba gseg ma dang //
T02D1270:51b-0: sol ba ro dum la @51b sogs pa //
T02D1270:51b-1: de dag legs par bsal bar bya //
T02D1270:51b-2: byung nas legs par ma bsal na //
T02D1270:51b-3: de la nges par skyon du 'gyur //
T02D1270:51b-4: rus pa ma bsal skyon gyis lus ni 'jig par 'gyur //
T02D1270:51b-5: sol ba ma bsal skyon gyis 'jig pa chen pos
T02D1270:51b-6: phog / thal bas nor shor mi rus kyis ni
T02D1270:51b-7: 'chi bar 'gyur // sbrul la sogs pa'i skyon ni legs par sngags kyis spang //
T02D1270:51b-8: ma spangs skyon gyis mkha' 'gro'i chad pa 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02D1270:51b-9: rdo dang rdul phye bye ma sen mo skra dang gyo mo bong ba dang //
T02D1270:51b-10: shing dang phag bu dri ma phug ma tsher ma rdo tshigs la sogs pa //
T02D1270:51b-11: ma bsal skyon gyis brdung brdeg rtsod dang rnam par 'tshe ba kun du 'byung //
T02D1270:51b-12: de phyir shin tu phra ba'i skyon yang legs par brtags te yongs su spang //
T02D1270:51b-13: pus mo'i tshad du brkos pas ni //
T02D1270:51b-14: sa brtag legs par ma byung na //
T02D1270:51b-15: rked pa'i tshad du brko bar bya //
T02D1270:51b-16: gseg ma la sogs mang gyur nas //
T02D1270:51b-17: de dag bsal bar ma nus na //
T02D1270:51b-18: chu dang yungs kar shis par bya //
T02D1270:51b-19: chu dang yungs kar lag bzung nas //
T02D1270:51b-20: sa gzhi yongs su khyab gtor te //
T02D1270:51b-21: sngags ni 'od bcas drag tu brjod //
T02D1270:51b-22: aom ha na ha na krodha h'um phat /
T02D1270:51b-23: de nas h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i chu dang
T02D1270:51b-24: sa la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis lan du
T02D1270:51b-25: mar bsngags te sa la khyab par gtor nas /
T02D1270:51b-26: rin po che lnga dang sman lnga rgyal ba'i sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1270:51b-27: dkyil 'khor gyi snying por bcug nas /
T02D1270:51b-28: shin tu mnyam par legs par brdung bar bya'o //
T02D1270:51b-29: bdag gam las kyi rdo rje ma yin pas mi bya'o //
T02D1270:51b-30: rgyal po'i pho brang nang dang ni //
T02D1270:51b-31: mi mnyam pa yi sa phyogs dang //
T02D1270:51b-32: glang chen ba glang ra ba dang //
T02D1270:51b-33: lha khang nang dang lam chen dang //
T02D1270:51b-34: chu dang mtsho yi 'gram du ni //
T02D1270:51b-35: de dag gnas su brko mi bya //
T02D1270:51b-36: sa ni yongs su dag bya'i phyir //
T02D1270:51b-37: lag pa bzhag nas gsang sngags brjod //
T02D1270:51b-38: sa phyogs yongs su dag pas ni //
T02D1270:51b-39: sems kyi sgrib pa spong bar 'gyur //
T02D1270:51b-40: aom raksha raksha h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1270:51b-41: de la dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa /
T02D1270:51b-42: sgo bzhi rta babs bzhis brgyan pa /
T02D1270:51b-43: bar snang khyab par gnas pa /
T02D1270:52a-2: dri zhim po'i me tog gi chun 'phyang dang kha dog sna tshogs kyi ras kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1270:52a-3: de lta bu'i sa phyogs pa'i rnam pa lngas dag
T02D1270:52a-4: pa la bdud rtsi lnga dang dri zhim pos byugs
T02D1270:52a-5: te / grva dang phyogs su spos kyis bkang ba'i phor bu bzhag la /
T02D1270:52a-6: der sbyin sreg la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1270:52a-7: de nas sa'i lha mo bkug ste /
T02D1270:52a-8: sa phyogs der byin gyis rlob pa'i bdag nyid du dmigs par bya'o //
T02D1270:52a-9: phyi'i sa sbyang ba'i rim pa'o /
T02D1270:52a-11: // / de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis bde ba'i stan la 'dug la /
T02D1270:52a-12: mnyam par gzhag pas legs par sbyangs pa'i sa la
T02D1270:52a-13: mchod pa dang gtor ma sngon du 'gro bas lhag
T02D1270:52a-14: pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par byas nas bgegs bskrad
T02D1270:52a-15: par byas te / las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis
T02D1270:52a-16: las thams cad pa'i chu la lan bdun du bsngags
T02D1270:52a-17: nas dkyil 'khor la bsang gtor du bya'o //
T02D1270:52a-18: de la aom bhu kham gi sngags kyis nam mkha'i rang bzhin du byas nas /
T02D1270:52a-19: h'um lam h'um gi sngags kyis sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du dmigs so //
T02D1270:52a-20: aom me di n'i badzr'i bha ba badzra bandha h'um
T02D1270:52a-21: gi sngags kyis sa gzhi de nyid brlab par bya'o
T02D1270:52a-22: // nang gi sa sbyang ba'i rim pa'o /
T02D1270:52a-24: // / de nas slob dpon gyis me tog dri zhim
T02D1270:52a-25: po sna tshogs sil mar bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1270:52a-26: dbus su rdo rje dril bu bzung nas 'dug ste
T02D1270:52a-27: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid
T02D1270:52a-28: kyi ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan par byas la
T02D1270:52a-29: / / phyogs gzhir goo r'i la sogs pa'i rnal
T02D1270:52a-30: 'byor du zhugs pa'i slob mas rdo rje dang dril
T02D1270:52a-32: rdo rje tshig bzhis bskul bar bya'o //
T02D1270:52a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02D1270:52a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D1270:52a-35: chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02D1270:52a-36: mtshan min thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02D1270:52a-37: mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02D1270:52a-38: kun du bzang po sku yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02D1270:52a-39: zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung //
T02D1270:52a-40: ye shes spyod pa rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1270:52a-41: kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02D1270:52a-42: sems can kun gyi thugs chen po //
T02D1270:52a-43: rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med //
T02D1270:52b-0: kun bzang @52b thugs mchog kha lo sgyur //
T02D1270:52b-1: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02D1270:52b-2: de ltar bskul nas bsngags pas sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D1270:52b-3: chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nga rgyal du byas
T02D1270:52b-5: nga nyid sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02D1270:52b-6: nga nyid byang chub sems kun nyid //
T02D1270:52b-7: nga nyid rdo rje nyi ma nyid //
T02D1270:52b-8: nga nyid rdo rje don yod de //
T02D1270:52b-9: nga nyid rdo rje chos kun yin //
T02D1270:52b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02D1270:52b-11: kun gyi thugs mchog nga nyid yin //
T02D1270:52b-13: aom badzro ttishta'i sngags kyis sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor bteg ste nam mkha'i khams su gzhag go //
T02D1270:52b-14: sems can gyi khams thams cad nyon mongs pa'i mun
T02D1270:52b-15: pas gtibs pa bsal ba'i don du snying rje'i bdag
T02D1270:52b-16: nyid bzhengs te / ta las zla ba mig g-yon pa /
T02D1270:52b-17: g-yas pa ma las nyi mar 'bar //
T02D1270:52b-19: rdo rje'i lta bas mnyam par blta //
T02D1270:52b-21: shin tu khro ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1270:52b-22: rdo rje shin tu gsor bar bya //
T02D1270:52b-23: sna tshogs rdo rje 'gros kyi gar //
T02D1270:52b-24: dril bu gnas su gsil bya zhing //
T02D1270:52b-25: khro gnyer 'jigs bcas h'um sgra sgrogs //
T02D1270:52b-26: sngags pa g-yas skor khros stangs kyis //
T02D1270:52b-27: 'khor lo'i sa la drag por bskor //
T02D1270:52b-28: lha sogs bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kyis //
T02D1270:52b-29: lus ngag yid la gnas pa yi //
T02D1270:52b-30: bgegs kyi tshogs ni thams cad nyon //
T02D1270:52b-31: dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa gzhi la gnas pa'i //
T02D1270:52b-32: lha la sogs pa'i bgegs chen kun nyon cig / rnal 'byor bde gshegs pho brang ngas bzhengs kyis //
T02D1270:52b-33: bgegs chen rigs sogs gang phyir 'byer bar gyis //
T02D1270:52b-34: nga ni kun dngos sangs rgyas rdo rje can //
T02D1270:52b-35: bde chen las byung rdo rje sems dpa' yin //
T02D1270:52b-36: nga ni snying rje chen po dpal dang ldan pa yin //
T02D1270:52b-37: srung ba'i 'khor lo nga yis rab 'byor pa //
T02D1270:52b-38: rdo rje 'bar ba'i khro gzugs kyis //
T02D1270:52b-39: gsang gsum rdo rje rab gsor bas //
T02D1270:52b-41: gal te nga yi bka' 'das na //
T02D1270:52b-43: phye mar gyur pa gdan mi za //
T02D1270:52b-44: de nas bgegs tshogs kun 'byer te //
T02D1270:52b-45: lhag ma lus pa cung zad med //
T02D1270:53a-3: // / de nas sngags pas bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i don du /
T02D1270:53a-4: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa smad rtse gsum phur bu'i dbyibs su gnas pa /
T02D1270:53a-5: stod khro bo chen po'i cha byad nyi ma 'bum
T02D1270:53a-6: gyi 'od 'bar bar bsams nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
T02D1270:53a-12: k'i la ya k'i la ya /
T02D1270:53a-14: h'um h'um badzra dha ra a'adzny'a pa ya ti /
T02D1270:53a-16: k'a ya b'a ka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1270:53a-17: sngags 'di dag phyogs thams cad du spros pa'i sbyor bas bgegs la gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:53a-18: de bgegs lhag ma med par gzhom par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1270:53a-19: phyogs so so nas dbang po la sogs pa'i phyogs skyong ba rnams /
T02D1270:53a-20: bu dang bu mo chung ma dang 'khor dang g-yog
T02D1270:53a-21: tu bcas pa gdug sems dang bcas pa rnams dkyil
T02D1270:53a-23: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sbyor ba dang sngags kyis so so'i lus ngag yid la gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:53a-24: btab ste rang bzhin med par dmigs so //
T02D1270:53a-25: phur bu gdab pa'i rim pa'o /
T02D1270:53a-27: // / de nas bgegs dang bral bar gyur pa la
T02D1270:53a-28: rno ba'i gzugs kyi 'od zer gyis bar snang khyab
T02D1270:53a-29: par byas la / phyi rol gyi rdo rje ra ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1270:53a-30: de la ram dmar po yongs su gyur pa'i nyi
T02D1270:53a-31: ma'i dbus su h'um nag po yongs su gyur pa
T02D1270:53a-32: las sna tshogs rdo rje 'od zer lnga dang ldan
T02D1270:53a-33: par rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1270:53a-34: de'i 'od zer rdo rje phra mo'i rang bzhin nam
T02D1270:53a-35: mkha'i khams yongs su khyab nas phyogs bcur 'phros te
T02D1270:53a-36: / shin tu mtshams med pa'i rdo rje'i ra bas gtams par bya'o //
T02D1270:53a-37: steng gi phyogs su 'phros pas ni rdo rje'i gur mtshams med par bya'o //
T02D1270:53a-38: 'og tu spros pas ni rdo rje'i sa gzhi brtan par bya'o //
T02D1270:53a-39: gur dang rdo rje ra ba las 'od zer phyogs thams cad du spros te /
T02D1270:53a-40: shin tu mtshams med par phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
T02D1270:53a-41: nyi ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i 'od zer mnyam par shin tu ring bar spros te /
T02D1270:53a-42: mtshams bcad pa'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin du dmigs so //
T02D1270:53a-43: rdo rje gur la sogs pa'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i rim pa'o /
T02D1270:53b-0: // / de nas pam ser po las skyes pa'i @53b
T02D1270:53b-1: sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo lus phyed 'thon
T02D1270:53b-2: pa / rin po che'i bum pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1270:53b-3: rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa /
T02D1270:53b-4: rang gi mdun gyi sa la de ltar dmigs te tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:53b-5: dgyes pa'i rdo rje khros mchod pa'i //
T02D1270:53b-6: lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02D1270:53b-7: rin chen sna tshogs phye ma yis //
T02D1270:53b-8: bdag gis don yod dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D1270:53b-9: de ltar sa yi lha mo la //
T02D1270:53b-10: gsol ba lan gsum btab nas ni //
T02D1270:53b-11: bsang gtor la sogs rab phul nas //
T02D1270:53b-12: phyi nas mchod pa kun bya ste //
T02D1270:53b-13: de nyid sa la thim nas ni //
T02D1270:53b-14: sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyi //
T02D1270:53b-16: de nas slob dpon las kyi rdo rje dang bcas
T02D1270:53b-17: pas bdud rtsi dri zhim pos dkyil 'khor byugs la
T02D1270:53b-18: / der me tog sna tshogs sil mas bkram la /
T02D1270:53b-19: dbus su bdud rtsi lngas dkyil 'khor dgu byas te /
T02D1270:53b-20: de nas gong du nam mkha'i khams su bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te /
T02D1270:53b-21: bdud rtsi lnga'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par dmigs so //
T02D1270:53b-22: de nas yang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D1270:53b-23: rdo rje ra ba la sogs pa srung ba'i 'khor
T02D1270:53b-25: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang de kho na nyid kyi mchod pas mchod de /
T02D1270:53b-26: bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba bya'o //
T02D1270:53b-27: sa gzung ba dang sta gon la sogs pa la mtshan mo'i dus su sgra'i mchod pa ni /
T02D1270:53b-35: gling bu'i sgras shin tu dal bas legs par mchod de /
T02D1270:53b-36: rdo rje'i glu shin tu dal bas gar dang bstun la legs par bsgyur ba dang /
T02D1270:53b-37: bkra shis kyi tshig snyan par brjod pa dang gar
T02D1270:53b-38: mkhan ma brgyan pas gar gyi 'gyur ba sna tshogs
T02D1270:53b-39: kyis dkyil 'khor gyi pho brang gi nang du mchod
T02D1270:53b-40: pa'i bye brag gis mchod par bya'o //
T02D1270:53b-41: de ltar legs par brtags pa'i dag par gyur pa'i
T02D1270:53b-42: dkyil 'khor gyi shar du rnal 'byor pa bde ba'i
T02D1270:53b-44: mdun gyi g-yon gyi char man 'ji la sogs pa'i
T02D1270:53b-45: steng du rin po che'i snod dri zhim po'i chu
T02D1270:53b-46: dang me tog gis bkang la /
T02D1270:53b-47: las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis lan bdun du bsngags la bsang gtor la sogs pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1270:54a-0: @54a * // rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pas bum pa sta gon la gnas par bya'o //
T02D1270:54a-1: de la nag por ri med pa /
T02D1270:54a-5: zhabs stegs med pa legs par bkrus la bdug pas bdugs te /
T02D1270:54a-12: shve ta aa pa r'a dzi ta dang /
T02D1270:54a-19: satta aa gha ste dri lnga'o //
T02D1270:54a-24: rgyal po rin po che lnga'o //
T02D1270:54a-25: de rnams yang dag par bsdus te /
T02D1270:54a-26: dag pa'i 'byor pa dang ldan pas bum par blugs par bya'o //
T02D1270:54a-30: ba lang la sogs pas ma brnyogs pa chu rin
T02D1270:54a-31: po che'i snod du dag pa'i skyes bus gzhan dang
T02D1270:54a-33: aom tapte tapte ma h'a tapte sv'a h'a /
T02D1270:54a-34: zhes brjod pas lha'i chu dag par gyur nas bum pa yongs su dgang bar bya'o //
T02D1270:54a-40: shing lnga bdug pas bdugs te kha rgyan du bya'o //
T02D1270:54a-41: ras sar pa ma nyams pa dri ma la sogs
T02D1270:54a-42: pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pas cod pan du byas
T02D1270:54a-43: te / bum pa'i dbus sam mgrin par chos kyi
T02D1270:54a-44: 'byung gnas kyi dbus su chud par so so'i lha'i
T02D1270:54a-45: phyag mtshan dri zhim pos legs par bri'o //
T02D1270:54a-46: de nas pam yongs su gyur pa las rin po che'i bum par bsam mo //
T02D1270:54a-48: me tog gi chun 'phyang gis brgyan pa /
T02D1270:54a-49: de dag gi dbus su gtso bo la sogs pa cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bskyed la /
T02D1270:54a-50: me tog phreng bas brgyan pa'i rdo rje'i skud pa
T02D1270:54a-51: la rdo rje dang ldan pas rnam par rgyal ba
T02D1270:54a-52: la sogs pa'i bum pa'i steng du bzhag la /
T02D1270:54a-53: lag pa g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje skud pa'i rtse mo la gzung la /
T02D1270:54a-54: g-yas pas gsang ba'i phreng ba thugs kar bzung nas /
T02D1270:54a-55: thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems dpa' dgug
T02D1270:54a-56: pa dang gzhug pa dang dbang bskur ba la sogs
T02D1270:54a-57: par dmigs nas / so so'i sngags yi ge gsum
T02D1270:54a-58: dang ldan pas bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad
T02D1270:54b-0: par dmigs nas / bya'o // @54b de nas 'khor lo'i lha rnams kyi bum pa la /
T02D1270:54b-1: bzlas pa gtso bo bas cung zad nyung yang rung //
T02D1270:54b-2: yang na rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan bdun bdun bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1270:54b-3: ji ltar gtso bo byin gyis brlabs pa de bzhin du 'khor rnams kyang byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D1270:54b-4: de nas bsang gtor nas brtsams te phyi dang nang
T02D1270:54b-5: dang gsang ba dang de kha na nyid kyis mchod
T02D1270:54b-6: nas rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas bstod pa
T02D1270:54b-7: bya'o // da nas bum pa gzhan yang sems can
T02D1270:54b-8: thams cad kyi phrin las rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1270:54b-9: bya'o // / ji ltar gong ma bzhin du las
T02D1270:54b-10: thams cad pa'i khro bos byin gyis brlabs nas las
T02D1270:54b-11: thams cad pa'i sngags yi ge gsum dang ldan pas
T02D1270:54b-12: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1270:54b-13: de la slob dpon la las ni shar la sogs pa'i bum pa brgyad ni 'di ltar gnas te /
T02D1270:54b-23: aom sum khum yum h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1270:54b-24: sngags 'dis lan bdun du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1270:54b-25: sta gon la gnas par bya'o zhes gsung ngo //
T02D1270:54b-26: bum pa sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1270:54b-27: de nas sngags pas me tog dri zhim po thal mos bzung ste /
T02D1270:54b-29: aom sarba aa th'a ga ta /
T02D1270:54b-31: bi l'a sa na mi tee ra na m'a mi
T02D1270:54b-32: bha ga b'a ntam dza: h'um bam ho: pra t'i
T02D1270:54b-33: tstsha ku su m'anydza li n'a tha ho: zhes brjod
T02D1270:54b-34: nas snyim pa'i me tog dor te /
T02D1270:54b-35: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la mchod par bya'o //
T02D1270:54b-36: de nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
T02D1270:54b-37: lag pas dri zhim po'i spos kyi snod thogs la /
T02D1270:54b-38: h'um shin tu phra ba lce la bsams nas /
T02D1270:54b-39: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje gsung du bsams te /
T02D1270:54b-41: bcom ldan khro bo rdo rje can //
T02D1270:54b-42: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1270:54b-43: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02D1270:54b-44: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D1270:54b-45: thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyis //
T02D1270:54b-47: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la //
T02D1270:54b-48: rjes su gnang ba mdzad du gsol //
T02D1270:54b-49: sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i don bya brtson //
T02D1270:54b-50: byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dpal //
T02D1270:55a-0: gzhan yang gsang sngags lha rnams @55a * //
T02D1270:55a-2: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
T02D1270:55a-3: gang yang 'byung po mthu can dang //
T02D1270:55a-4: gzhan yang lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i //
T02D1270:55a-5: sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams //
T02D1270:55a-6: bdag la dgongs pa mdzad du gsol //
T02D1270:55a-7: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis //
T02D1270:55a-8: dgyes pa'i rdo rje dpal 'byung ba'i //
T02D1270:55a-9: 'gro ba dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1270:55a-11: deng bdag slob mar bcas pa la //
T02D1270:55a-12: thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su //
T02D1270:55a-13: tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1270:55a-14: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1270:55a-15: de ltar lan gsum gsol ba btab nas mchod pa dang bstod par bya'o //
T02D1270:55a-16: lha sta gon la gnas pa'i rim pa'o /
T02D1270:55a-18: // / de nas sngags pa dkyil 'khor gyi nang nas phyir byung ste /
T02D1270:55a-19: srung ba'i 'khor lo byas nas slob ma sta gon la gnas par bya'o //
T02D1270:55a-20: bla ma'i mdun du mandala phul //
T02D1270:55a-21: me tog phreng thogs rang slob ma //
T02D1270:55a-22: yid gzhungs spro ba che ba dang //
T02D1270:55a-23: byas pa gzo zhing nga rgyal med //
T02D1270:55a-24: rigs mtho yon tan ldan zhing dang //
T02D1270:55a-25: gzugs bzang kha dog lang tshor ldan //
T02D1270:55a-26: bde bar gshegs pa'i gsang ba ni //
T02D1270:55a-27: sgrub pa'i don gnyer mngon brtson nas //
T02D1270:55a-28: gzugs ngan yon tan med pa dang //
T02D1270:55a-29: dman pa'ang lhag par gnas par bya //
T02D1270:55a-30: dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga la //
T02D1270:55a-31: 'khor bzhi dag kyang rjes su gnang //
T02D1270:55a-32: rang gi bslab dang shin tu ldan //
T02D1270:55a-33: theg pa chen la dga' ba'i bdag / la lar gsang sngags sgrub don gnyer //
T02D1270:55a-35: bsod nams 'dod pa de las gzhan //
T02D1270:55a-36: gzhan dag 'jig rten gzhan don gnyer //
T02D1270:55a-37: 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer ba'i //
T02D1270:55a-38: dad pa mang du byed pa yis //
T02D1270:55a-39: blo ldan dkyil 'khor gzhug bya yi //
T02D1270:55a-43: 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer skyes //
T02D1270:55a-45: de skad brjod nas slob ma de //
T02D1270:55a-46: blo yis rang gi snying gar gzhug / rdo rje'i lam nas phyung nas ni //
T02D1270:55a-47: yum gyi chu skyes steng bkod la //
T02D1270:55a-48: yang bsdus de bzhin gshegs pa yi //
T02D1270:55a-49: 'od kyi gong bu bkug nas bstim //
T02D1270:55b-0: rdo rje padma mnyam @55b sbyor bas //
T02D1270:55b-1: ye shes thig le las 'byung ba'i //
T02D1270:55b-2: slob ma dkyil 'khor sgor bzhag ste //
T02D1270:55b-3: thal sbyar gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02D1270:55b-4: khyod ni gtso bo chen po ste //
T02D1270:55b-5: bdag med ma dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1270:55b-6: dpa' chen khyod la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D1270:55b-7: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D1270:55b-8: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las grol ba'i //
T02D1270:55b-9: khyod ni bde ba chen po ste //
T02D1270:55b-10: de bzhin bdag la stsal du gsol //
T02D1270:55b-11: byang chub chen po'i tshul brtan pa'i //
T02D1270:55b-12: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D1270:55b-13: dam tshig de ni bdag la stsol //
T02D1270:55b-14: byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol //
T02D1270:55b-15: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02D1270:55b-16: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D1270:55b-17: gnas mchog chen po'i pho brang du //
T02D1270:55b-18: de bzhin bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02D1270:55b-19: de ltar lan gsum gsol btab nas //
T02D1270:55b-20: slob ma rnams kyi mchog gyur pas //
T02D1270:55b-21: zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1270:55b-22: thal mo sbyar nas 'dud par 'dug / de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
T02D1270:55b-23: slob ma'i gtso bo yongs bzung nas //
T02D1270:55b-24: tshigs bcad 'di ni brjod par bya //
T02D1270:55b-25: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02D1270:55b-26: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te //
T02D1270:55b-27: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga 'di //
T02D1270:55b-28: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02D1270:55b-29: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02D1270:55b-30: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02D1270:55b-31: da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1270:55b-32: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D1270:55b-33: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams //
T02D1270:55b-34: de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi //
T02D1270:55b-35: cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas //
T02D1270:55b-36: dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du //
T02D1270:55b-37: thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes //
T02D1270:55b-38: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pa //
T02D1270:55b-39: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02D1270:55b-40: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa //
T02D1270:55b-41: dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02D1270:55b-42: 'gro ba rnams kyi de yi phyir //
T02D1270:55b-43: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa'o //
T02D1270:55b-44: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02D1270:55b-45: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / de ltar rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
T02D1270:55b-46: dril bu'i sgra ldan lan gsum brjod //
T02D1270:55b-47: de nas gnang ba thob pa dang slob ma sdig
T02D1270:55b-48: pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas gsum la
T02D1270:55b-49: skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa rgyas par bya'o
T02D1270:55b-50: // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D1270:56a-0: @56a * // bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D1270:56a-1: dus 'di nas ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1270:56a-2: bslab pa gsum gyi tshul khrims dang //
T02D1270:56a-3: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02D1270:56a-4: sems can don byed tshul khrims dang //
T02D1270:56a-5: de bzhin bdag gis brtan por gzung //
T02D1270:56a-6: rdo rje chen po'i rigs dag pa'i //
T02D1270:56a-7: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02D1270:56a-8: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1270:56a-9: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1270:56a-10: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D1270:56a-11: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D1270:56a-12: nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02D1270:56a-13: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02D1270:56a-14: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02D1270:56a-15: padma'i rigs mchog dag pa la //
T02D1270:56a-16: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02D1270:56a-17: dam pa'i chos rnams ma lus gzung //
T02D1270:56a-18: las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D1270:56a-19: sdom pa thams cad ldan pa ni //
T02D1270:56a-20: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1270:56a-21: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D1270:56a-22: bla na med pa'i byang chub mchog sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir //
T02D1270:56a-23: bdag gis yang dag bskyed par bgyi //
T02D1270:56a-24: ji ltar gsung ba'i sdom pa rnams //
T02D1270:56a-25: de bzhin bdag gis gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1270:56a-26: ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi //
T02D1270:56a-27: ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi //
T02D1270:56a-28: dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs phyung zhing //
T02D1270:56a-29: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D1270:56a-30: de ltar lan gsum brjod par bya //
T02D1270:56a-31: de ltar 'dzin par ma nus na //
T02D1270:56a-32: tshigs bcad 'di tsam brjod par bya //
T02D1270:56a-33: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D1270:56a-34: sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi //
T02D1270:56a-35: bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang //
T02D1270:56a-36: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D1270:56a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la
T02D1270:56a-38: skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa sbyin par bya'o
T02D1270:56a-39: // de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma
T02D1270:56a-40: rnams kyi snying ga dang mgrin pa dang spyi bor
T02D1270:56a-41: bdag med ma dang sa spyod ma dang mkha' spyod
T02D1270:56a-43: phyag g-yas pa'i rdo rje snying ga la sogs par
T02D1270:56a-44: gtug cing yi ge gsum 'od zer dang bcas pas
T02D1270:56a-47: mar me dang spos dang lha bshos ni mdun du sbyin /
T02D1270:56a-49: mar me gsal na dngos grub ni //
T02D1270:56a-50: ji ltar bsams pa de bzhin 'grub //
T02D1270:56b-2: yud tsam yud tsam 'bar ba ni //
T02D1270:56b-3: bgegs dang bar chad yin par bshad //
T02D1270:56b-7: aa shvadtha la sogs pa 'o ma can gyi shing sor bcu gnyis pa'i chad du gnas pa /
T02D1270:56b-8: srog chags med pa mi g-yo ba bskams pa dang
T02D1270:56b-9: gas pa ma yin pa rtse mo'i cha las byung
T02D1270:56b-10: ba dri zhim po'i chus legs par bkrus te /
T02D1270:56b-11: gnas gsum du me tog gi phreng ba dkris nas slob ma'i lag tu bzhag la /
T02D1270:56b-12: aom a'a: dzi hva sam brta ni h'um phat /
T02D1270:56b-13: ces lan gsum du yongs su bsngags te sbyin no //
T02D1270:56b-14: de nas slob ma de shar phyogs sam dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs la /
T02D1270:56b-15: ba ko tsam du ba byung rnam lngas legs par byung ba'i mandala la /
T02D1270:56b-16: so shing gis bla ma'i man ngag bzhin du ngag gi sgrib pa bzhar nas /
T02D1270:56b-17: lhag pa'i lha la dngos grub kyi gsol ba 'debs pa'i don du so shing 'dor bar bya'o //
T02D1270:56b-18: so shing dor ba brgya zhig na //
T02D1270:56b-19: rtse mo gyen du bltas na ni //
T02D1270:56b-20: de yis dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D1270:56b-21: rtse mo shar du bltas pa dang //
T02D1270:56b-22: de bzhin bdag la bltas pa ni //
T02D1270:56b-23: de ni dngos grub 'bring du bshad //
T02D1270:56b-24: lho dang mtshams su rtse ba bltas na //
T02D1270:56b-25: 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub thob //
T02D1270:56b-26: so shing 'dor ba brgya zhig la //
T02D1270:56b-27: gal te 'og tu rtse ba bltas na //
T02D1270:56b-28: sa 'og gi ni dngos grub ste //
T02D1270:56b-30: rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol du //
T02D1270:56b-31: phog na de la dngos grub med //
T02D1270:56b-32: de nas slob ma bdun bkug nas //
T02D1270:56b-34: dharm'a p'a pa ni ts'a s+ya bi sho dha ya /
T02D1270:56b-35: sarba bi kalpa aa pa na ya h'um /
T02D1270:56b-37: yid kyi sgrib pa dag pa'i phyir //
T02D1270:56b-38: lan gsum du skyor chu blud par bya'o //
T02D1270:56b-39: de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags yongs su bzlas nas srung skud la mdud pa gsum byas pa /
T02D1270:56b-40: slob ma smin par ma gyur gyi tshe dpung pa g-yas pa la gdags par bya'o //
T02D1270:56b-41: de nas lus kyi sgrib pa dag pa dang rtags
T02D1270:56b-42: nye bar ston pa'i don du las thams cad pa'i
T02D1270:56b-43: sngags lan bdun bdun du bsngags la /
T02D1270:56b-44: ku sha gcig sngags su sbyin /
T02D1270:56b-45: gzhan dag stan la sogs par byin no //
T02D1270:57a-0: de nas sems kyi gzengs bstod @57a * //
T02D1270:57a-1: par bya ba'i phyir chos bshad par bya ste /
T02D1270:57a-2: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams //
T02D1270:57a-4: au dumw'a ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02D1270:57a-5: brgya lam la ni res 'ga' zhig / shin tu dkon par 'byung ba ste //
T02D1270:57a-6: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba //
T02D1270:57a-7: de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste //
T02D1270:57a-8: gang zhig sems can mi mnyam don //
T02D1270:57a-9: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02D1270:57a-10: bskal pa bye ba du ma ru //
T02D1270:57a-11: sdig pa bgyis par gyur pa gang //
T02D1270:57a-14: grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i //
T02D1270:57a-15: tshul la gnas pa smos ci 'tshal //
T02D1270:57a-16: skyob pa'i gsangs sngags bzlas na ni //
T02D1270:57a-18: gang dag spyod pa'i mchog 'di la //
T02D1270:57a-19: blo gros shin tu mi g-yo ba //
T02D1270:57a-20: de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun //
T02D1270:57a-21: sdug bsngal kun 'byung thams cad gcod //
T02D1270:57a-22: bdag nyid chen po de rnams kyis //
T02D1270:57a-23: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
T02D1270:57a-24: gar phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa //
T02D1270:57a-25: bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni //
T02D1270:57a-26: bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun //
T02D1270:57a-27: yongs su gzung ste skye bzhin pa //
T02D1270:57a-28: de bzhin khyed rnams theg chen la //
T02D1270:57a-29: sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1270:57a-30: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02D1270:57a-31: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02D1270:57a-32: khyed rnams der ni 'gro bas na //
T02D1270:57a-33: rang 'byung skal ba chen po pa //
T02D1270:57a-34: 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
T02D1270:57a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02D1270:57a-36: yod med dag las rnam par 'das //
T02D1270:57a-37: nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med ;
T02D1270:57a-38: / chos rnams kun las zab 'gyur zhing //
T02D1270:57a-39: spros pa thams cad spangs pa yin //
T02D1270:57a-40: spros pa rnams kyis rab tu spros //
T02D1270:57a-41: theg po chen po la gnas na //
T02D1270:57a-43: de nas slob ma'i tshogs dga' ba'i sems kyis langs te /
T02D1270:57a-44: da ni so sor nyal bar gyis shig / nang
T02D1270:57a-45: par dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur bas ji srid mthong
T02D1270:57a-46: ba'i rmi lam legs par zlos shig ces bsgos nas
T02D1270:57a-47: / aom raksha raksha h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags sam /
T02D1270:57a-48: las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1270:57b-0: de nas ku sha'i gdan la nyal bar @57b bya'o //
T02D1270:57b-1: slob ma sta gon la gnas pa'i rim pa'o /
T02D1270:57b-3: // / de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor
T02D1270:57b-4: bsdus nas ji srid nus kyi bar du las thams
T02D1270:57b-5: cad pa'i sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D1270:57b-6: seng ge'i nyal stangs kyis nyal bar bya'o //
T02D1270:57b-7: nang par langs pa'i dus su ni //
T02D1270:57b-8: khrus byas mtshan mo'i rmi lam dri //
T02D1270:57b-9: legs par bsams te zlos la mnyan //
T02D1270:57b-10: dge dang mi dge brtag par bya //
T02D1270:57b-11: sangs rgyas phrad dang sku gzugs mchod rten mchod //
T02D1270:57b-12: chos la 'jug cing dge slong dge 'dun phrang //
T02D1270:57b-13: gtsug lag khang dang sangs rgyas sras bcas dge slong ma //
T02D1270:57b-14: me tog ra ba ri dang dgon par gnas bcas dang //
T02D1270:57b-15: 'bab chu chu klung rdzing dang rgya mtsho sgrol ba dang //
T02D1270:57b-16: ri dags dbang phyug ae ne ya dang ba glang phrad //
T02D1270:57b-17: 'khor los mtshan pa la sogs gnod sbyin bzang po mthong //
T02D1270:57b-18: skyes bu dam pa'i sgom ba rmi lam phrad mthong dang //
T02D1270:57b-19: gyen la 'gro dang glang chen zhon dang ri bzangs
T02D1270:57b-20: 'dzeg / bla re bzang dang khang bzangs dpag bsam
T02D1270:57b-21: brten pa dang // dge bsnyen rgyal po dge slong skyabs sbyin mthong ba dang //
T02D1270:57b-22: sngags kyis dbang phyug khyad par rig ma bsten mthong dang //
T02D1270:57b-23: pha dang ma dang nam mkhar 'gro dang slob dpon phrad //
T02D1270:57b-24: lha yi bu mo gsang dag rig ma bsten pa dang //
T02D1270:57b-25: dam pa'i sgrub thabs yon tan ldan pa bram ze mthong //
T02D1270:57b-26: mchod pa chen po rtsom dang gzhal yas khang mthong dang //
T02D1270:57b-27: rgyan dang gos dang 'bru yi phung po mtshon cha 'dzin //
T02D1270:57b-28: sbyin sreg byed dang 'bras bu me tog legs thob mthong //
T02D1270:57b-29: rgyal po dbang bskur 'bru tshogs rin chen rnyed pa dang //
T02D1270:57b-30: g-yul du rgyal zhing dgra dpung bcings dang brtson bzung mthong //
T02D1270:57b-31: rgya mtsho chen po bsgral zhing khrus byed mthong ba dang //
T02D1270:57b-32: lam rtsub bgrod dka' 'phur zhing bsgral bar mthong ba dang //
T02D1270:57b-33: de ltar mthong ba'i rmi lam ni dge ba'i rtags
T02D1270:57b-34: te rjes su yi rang zhing brten pa'i chog bya'o
T02D1270:57b-35: // de las gzhan pa ni mi dge ba'i rmi lam du bshad do //
T02D1270:57b-36: dge ba las ni dngos po grub tu 'gyur zhing /
T02D1270:57b-37: mi dge ba las ni ma yin no //
T02D1270:57b-38: de ltar mi dge ba'i rtags mthong na sngags pas
T02D1270:57b-39: las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis shis pa'i cho ga
T02D1270:58a-1: lam gyi bdag nyid rang bzhin med cing chos thams
T02D1270:58a-2: cad kyi rang bzhin de kho na nyid du mos
T02D1270:58a-3: par bya'o // de nas rmi lam gyi rtags zhi ba dang dngos grub kyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
T02D1270:58a-4: de nas rnal 'byor pas dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i ting
T02D1270:58a-5: nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan par byas la sta gon
T02D1270:58a-6: la gnas pa dang sngon du spyan drangs pa'i dkyil
T02D1270:58a-7: 'khor nam mkha'i phyogs su gshegs su gsol nas /
T02D1270:58a-8: dur khrod las byung ba'am shes rab ma mtshan dang ldan pas cho ga byas te /
T02D1270:58a-9: ras bal las bkal ba'i skud pa kha dog dkar ba dang /
T02D1270:58a-13: nag po dur khrod kyi tshon gyis bsgyur te /
T02D1270:58a-14: don grub kyi phye mas kyang bsre bar bya'o //
T02D1270:58a-16: bhr'um a'am dzr'im dzr'am h'um de dag gis bskyed pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1270:58a-19: don yod grub pa dang mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin du bskyed de /
T02D1270:58a-20: me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i
T02D1270:58a-21: bdag nyid kyis nyi shu rtsa lngar rnam par phyi
T02D1270:58a-22: ba'i rim pas bskyed de gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1270:58a-23: de nas phyogs so so nas rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1270:58a-24: la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga'i bdag
T02D1270:58a-26: de dag gi snying gar bhr'um la sogs pa'i yi
T02D1270:58a-27: ge yongs su gyur pa las ye shes kyi thig
T02D1270:58a-28: skud 'od zer dang bcas pa dmigs so //
T02D1270:58a-29: aom a'a: sha shva ta badzra /
T02D1270:58a-30: su tsa me phra ya tstsha ma h'a mandala /
T02D1270:58a-31: su tr'a na ya h'um zhes pas rnam par snang mdzad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:58a-32: de bzhin rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa yang
T02D1270:58a-33: sngags kyi gnas su ming gi yi ge shes pas
T02D1270:58a-34: gsol ba gdab par gsungs so //
T02D1270:58a-35: de nas slob dpon dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas dza las zla ba las dang /
T02D1270:58a-36: ma las nyi ma'i mig bsam par bya'o //
T02D1270:58a-37: 'bar ba'i lta bas phyogs rnams khyab par bltas la /
T02D1270:58a-38: mig gi lcags kyus ye shes kyi thig skud dgug par bya ste /
T02D1270:58a-39: bcom ldan 'das su byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1270:58a-40: so so'i khyad kyi thig skud ni gcig tu bsdus te /
T02D1270:58a-41: ghasma r'i'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i slob mas bsgril bar bya'o //
T02D1270:58a-42: aom aa nyo nya ga ta sarba dharma: par spa ra aa nu ga t'a /
T02D1270:58b-1: aa nu pra be sha sarba dharm'a: h'um zhes brjod cing thig skud bkal bar bya'o //
T02D1270:58b-2: de nas 'di ltar bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1270:58b-3: gcig tu bsgril nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang
T02D1270:58b-4: tha mi dad par byas nas ring thung dkyil 'khor
T02D1270:58b-5: gyi nyis 'gyur tshad du byas te /
T02D1270:58b-6: sbom phra sgo'i nyi shu char bya'o //
T02D1270:58b-7: de nas sngags pas gser la sogs snod du bdud rtsi lnga dang dri bzangs kyis spangs te /
T02D1270:58b-8: yi ge gsum gyis mtshan nas /
T02D1270:58b-9: mchod pa rnam pa lnga byas te /
T02D1270:58b-10: rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la h'um mang du brjod pas bsrung bar bya ste /
T02D1270:58b-11: de nas yang sngags pas dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi lnga dang dri zhim pos chag chag btab la /
T02D1270:58b-12: me tog gis sil ma bkram zhing thugs ka'i 'od
T02D1270:58b-13: zer gyis nam mkhar dgyes pa'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor
T02D1270:58b-15: bsang gtor la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa'i khyad par bya'o //
T02D1270:58b-16: de nas dgyes pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor dang ldan pas thig skud kyi rtse mo /
T02D1270:58b-17: ghasma r'i'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i slob ma la gtad de /
T02D1270:58b-18: mig gnyis dza las gyur pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma kha dog ser po dmigs te /
T02D1270:58b-19: de nas sngags pas nub nas shar du mngon par dmigs te /
T02D1270:58b-20: thig skud kyi rtse mo rdo rje khu tshur gyis
T02D1270:58b-21: lte ba'i gnas su gzung ste slob ma la gtad
T02D1270:58b-22: nas / dza dza dza zhes brjod de bka' bsgo bar bya'o //
T02D1270:58b-23: blo dang ldan pas kyang dza dza dza zhes brjod
T02D1270:58b-24: de thig skud kyi rtse mo blangs te gzung bar
T02D1270:58b-25: bya'o // slob dpon shar du mngon par phyogs shing slob ma nub tu bltas te /
T02D1270:58b-26: rdo rje mthe bong dang mdzub mo'i sbyor bas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:58b-27: de bzhin du 'og tu yang gdab po //
T02D1270:58b-28: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02D1270:58b-29: de dag brjod cing g-yas su rdo rje gzung ba'i mthe bong dang mdzub mos thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:58b-30: lte ba'am snying gar gzung ste nam mkhar bltas la /
T02D1270:58b-31: phyogs thams cad du mnyam par tshangs thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:58b-32: de nas sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i don du
T02D1270:58b-33: thig gi sgras nam mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin
T02D1270:58b-34: gshegs pa thams cad bskul te /
T02D1270:58b-35: de nas bskor te slob dpon byang du mngon par phyogs la /
T02D1270:59a-2: de nas slob dpon byang du bltas la slob ma lhor bltas te shar du gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:59a-3: de nas bskor te lho dang byang phyogs su bltas la nub kyi cha la gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:59a-4: yang bskor te rlung mtshams nas shar du bltas te /
T02D1270:59a-5: dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas nub tu bltas te byang gi cha la gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:59a-6: me'i mtshams nas nub tu kha bltas te /
T02D1270:59a-7: srin po'i mtshams nas shar du bltas la lho'i cha
T02D1270:59a-8: la gdab par bya'o // de nyid nas rlung gi
T02D1270:59a-9: phyogs su bltas te zur thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:59a-10: bden bral gyi phyogs nas dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas la zur thig gdab po //
T02D1270:59a-11: de nas tshangs thig nas 'khor lo brgyad kyi char sgo'i thig gdab po //
T02D1270:59a-12: rtsa ba'i thig nas brtsams te gru bzhi'i char sgo'i tshon gyi snam bu'i thig gdab po //
T02D1270:59a-13: de'i phyi rol du sgo'i cha'i phyed du 'dod yon gyi snam bu'i thig gdab po //
T02D1270:59a-14: de'i phyi rol du tshon rtsi'i cha dang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i rtsig pa'i thig gdab po //
T02D1270:59a-15: de'i phyi rol du 'dod yon gyi snam bu dang
T02D1270:59a-16: mnyam pa'i dra ba phyed pa dang rdo rje zla
T02D1270:59a-17: tshes dang bcas pa'i thig gdab po //
T02D1270:59a-18: de'i phyi rol du tshon gyi cha dang mnyam pa'i thig gdab po //
T02D1270:59a-19: de nas sgo bzhi'i 'gram du tshon gyi cha dang mnyam pa'i lha'i snam bu'i thig gdab po //
T02D1270:59a-20: de nas sgo'i cha dang mnyam pa'i ka ba'i thig gdab po //
T02D1270:59a-21: de nas sgo'i cha sum 'gyur rta babs sgo'i steng du ji ltar mdzes pa'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:59a-22: de nas thig skud nyis khug tu byas la dbus
T02D1270:59a-23: su seng ldeng gi phur bu brtan par btsugs te
T02D1270:59a-24: / byang shar nas mtshams la g-yas skor du bskor la /
T02D1270:59a-25: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ra ba gsum gyi thig drang ngo //
T02D1270:59a-26: thig skud de nyis khug tu byas la dkyil 'khor
T02D1270:59a-27: gyi dbus su rdo rje ra bas bskor ba'i thig
T02D1270:59a-28: drang ngo // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol
T02D1270:59a-29: du grva thig rdo rje'i lcags ri'i nang du chud
T02D1270:59a-30: par dur khrod brgyad kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:59a-31: bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor la ni pho brang nyis rim gyi thig gdab ste //
T02D1270:59a-32: ka ba brgyad la sogs pa'i thig ni de dang mtshungs par gdab po //
T02D1270:59a-33: shar phyogs 'khor lo ni lho nas byang du mngon par phyogs la ka ba'i char thig gdab po //
T02D1270:59b-0: nub @59b kyi padma ni byang nas lhor mngon par phyogs la ka ba'i char thig gdab po //
T02D1270:59b-1: byang gi ral gri ni nub nas shar du phyogs te ka ba'i char thig gdab po //
T02D1270:59b-2: lho'i rin po che ni shar nas nub tu phyogs te ka ba'i char thig gdab po //
T02D1270:59b-3: de nas rnal 'byor pa gang zhig thig 'debs par
T02D1270:59b-4: brtson par 'dod pas slob ma dang mi ldan na
T02D1270:59b-5: phur bu la btags te gdab par bya'o //
T02D1270:59b-6: thig gi dus su ltas brtag par bya ste /
T02D1270:59b-7: srad bu chad na slob dpon 'chi //
T02D1270:59b-8: ring thung khyer na na bar 'gyur //
T02D1270:59b-10: de'i rtags ni tshangs thig 'debs pa'i dus su brtag par bya'o //
T02D1270:59b-11: yang na tshangs thig dang zur thig gi dus su brtag par bya'o //
T02D1270:59b-12: yang na tshangs pa la sogs pa'i thig thams cad kyi dbus su brtag par bya'o //
T02D1270:59b-13: de nas so so'i sgo'i tshangs thig de dbyi bar bya'o //
T02D1270:59b-14: gzhan yang mtshon gnas skabs su byung ba'i thig thams cad kyang dbyi bar bya'o //
T02D1270:59b-15: gzhan sgo 'gram so so'i lha snam la sogs pa'i thig rkang tshad tsam du dbyi bar bya'o //
T02D1270:59b-16: de nas dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i mtshams
T02D1270:59b-17: su yang thig rkang tshad tsam du dbyi bar bya'o
T02D1270:59b-18: // rin po che'i rtsig pa'i mtshams su yang thig rkang tshad tsam du dbyi bar bya'o //
T02D1270:59b-19: de'i sgo'i phugs kyi thig rkang bdun yang rkang tshad tsam du dbyi bar bya'o //
T02D1270:59b-20: de ltar thig btab pa'i dkyil 'khor shin tu mnyam par legs par bri'o //
T02D1270:59b-21: dkyil 'khor gyi pho brang shin tu gzabs par bri'o //
T02D1270:59b-22: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1270:59b-23: rta babs bzhi yis rnam par mdzes //
T02D1270:59b-24: thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02D1270:59b-25: dar dpyangs me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D1270:59b-26: kha dog lnga yis rnam par mdzes //
T02D1270:59b-27: dkyil 'khor dam pa khru gsum pa //
T02D1270:59b-28: tshon gsum gyis ni lhag par gnas //
T02D1270:59b-29: gru yi phyogs ni thams cad dang //
T02D1270:59b-30: sgo khyud kyi ni phyogs rnams su //
T02D1270:59b-31: rdo rje rin chen legs spras pas //
T02D1270:59b-32: bdag med ma yi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1270:59b-33: phyi yi mtshan nyid de dang mtshungs //
T02D1270:59b-34: phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyed kyi tshad //
T02D1270:59b-35: dbus su mnyam par blta bar bya //
T02D1270:59b-36: 'khor lo'i ka ba la sogs pa'i //
T02D1270:59b-37: rdo rje phreng bas legs par bskor //
T02D1270:59b-38: rlung yab me long gis brgyan bya //
T02D1270:60a-0: @60a * // gdugs dang ba dan rgyan rnams kyis //
T02D1270:60a-1: 'khor lo'i nang du bkod par bya //
T02D1270:60a-2: de ltar chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1270:60a-3: la thig gdab par rnam par phye nas kha dog
T02D1270:60a-4: dang ldan pa'i thig skud de yi ge gsum gyi
T02D1270:60a-5: mthar mu: dang ldan pas gshegs su gsol la dag
T02D1270:60a-6: pa'i snod du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1270:60a-7: de nas rdo rje slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la /
T02D1270:60a-8: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i mig hi las zla ba dang nyi ma'i bdag nyid du blta'o //
T02D1270:60a-9: khro bo'i lta bas phyogs thams cad du mnyam par bltas la /
T02D1270:60a-10: yid kyis sgo bzhi phye bar bsam la phyir byung ngo //
T02D1270:60a-13: // / de nas rin po che'i rigs las byung ba dang /
T02D1270:60a-14: rin po che'i rigs su gtogs pa'i tshon dang /
T02D1270:60a-15: 'bras bu las kha dog tu bsgyur ba dang /
T02D1270:60a-16: dur khrod kyi pha gu dang /
T02D1270:60a-19: rkun ma'i lo ma dang de rnams las bya ste /
T02D1270:60a-25: de dag zhib par btags te ras tshags la btsags la spos kyis legs par bdugs la /
T02D1270:60a-26: dag pa'i snod du blugs te so so'i phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1270:60a-27: de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis rang bzhin med par byas la /
T02D1270:60a-28: bhr'um a'ami dzr'am kham h'um yongs su bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1270:60a-29: de ltar mdun du dmigs so //
T02D1270:60a-30: ji lta sngon du gsungs pa bzhin rnam par snang
T02D1270:60a-31: mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1270:60a-32: kyi ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi 'bar ba'i lta
T02D1270:60a-33: bas lcags kyu'i sbyor bas bkug ste sa bon dang
T02D1270:60a-35: 'od zer 'bar ba ye shes kyi rang bzhin du
T02D1270:60a-36: bltas la gsang sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o
T02D1270:60a-37: // aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /
T02D1270:60a-38: aom badzra be ga zhes sngags 'di brjod la ye
T02D1270:60a-39: shes kyi thig skud yid kyis bsal nas dkyil 'khor
T02D1270:60a-41: dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phur bu h'um zhes brjod
T02D1270:60a-42: la phyung nas phyag gi rdo rje la thim par
T02D1270:60a-43: bsam mo // tshon sna lngas khung bu yongs su
T02D1270:60a-44: bkang la rtags ma yin pa srid na bsal bar
T02D1270:60a-45: bya ba'i don du dril bu'i sgra dang ldan pas
T02D1270:60a-46: rdo rje'i glu blang bar bya'o //
T02D1270:60b-0: 'di @60b ni chos dbyings dag pa ste //
T02D1270:60b-1: sems can khams ni sgrol byed pa //
T02D1270:60b-2: dgyes rdor rgyal po rang nyid ni //
T02D1270:60b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D1270:60b-4: nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba //
T02D1270:60b-5: 'khor lo nang nas yang dag gnas //
T02D1270:60b-6: shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor bdag / g-yon gyi khu tshur gyis gzung ste //
T02D1270:60b-7: dbang ldan gyi ni mtshams nas brtsams /
T02D1270:60b-12: nag po'i tshon rnams ni phyi rol nas nang gi
T02D1270:60b-13: rim pas g-yas skor du mnyam par rgyun mi 'chad
T02D1270:60b-16: dkar po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin //
T02D1270:60b-17: gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste //
T02D1270:60b-18: padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin te //
T02D1270:60b-20: nag po nang du shes bya ste //
T02D1270:60b-21: 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad //
T02D1270:60b-22: 'di ltar spyan drang bar bya ste /
T02D1270:60b-26: sgo'i nyi shu char gnas pa dang /
T02D1270:60b-27: nas kyi tshad tsam du bar ma 'dres par so sor drang bar bya'o //
T02D1270:60b-28: de nas sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pas ltas blta bar bya ste /
T02D1270:60b-29: sbom por bkye na nad kyis 'debs //
T02D1270:60b-30: phra mos nor ni rnam par 'jig / yon pos rnam par 'chad pa yi //
T02D1270:60b-31: bla ma dang ni slob ma 'chi //
T02D1270:60b-32: g-yas skor min par bkye ba yis //
T02D1270:60b-33: tshon gyi phur bus btab 'gyur dang //
T02D1270:60b-34: slob dpon slob ma gnyis ka la //
T02D1270:60b-36: de nas dbus kyi pho brang gi thig tshad nas gzung ste //
T02D1270:60b-37: sgo rnams kyi cha la shar phyogs su dkar po dgod par bya'o //
T02D1270:60b-38: lho'i cha la ser po dgod par bya'o //
T02D1270:60b-39: nub kyi cha la dmar po dgod par bya'o //
T02D1270:60b-40: byang phyogs su ljang gu dgod dpar bya'o //
T02D1270:60b-41: dbus su nag po dgod par bya'o //
T02D1270:60b-42: de nas dbus su padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad
T02D1270:60b-43: pa gser dang bcas pa'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D1270:60b-44: 'khor dgod do // de'i steng du sna tshogs rdo
T02D1270:60b-45: rje'i lte ba la thod pa dkar po nang dmar
T02D1270:60b-46: po sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan par bya'o //
T02D1270:60b-48: phyag drug pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje la ni rang
T02D1270:60b-49: gi rigs kyi bdag po kha dog nag po 'bar
T02D1270:61a-0: ba bri ste / shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la @61a * //
T02D1270:61a-1: ni sna tshogs rdo rje spangs pa'i thod dkar po rim pa bzhin bri bar bya'o //
T02D1270:61a-2: yang na shar sgor padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gri gug nag po bri ba'o //
T02D1270:61a-3: lho'i sgor cang te'u dmar po bri'o //
T02D1270:61a-4: nub kyi sgor rus sbal ser po bri'o //
T02D1270:61a-5: byang gi sgor sbrul ma rgad lta bu bri'o //
T02D1270:61a-6: byang shar mtshams su shar bha aindra n'i la lta bu bri'o //
T02D1270:61a-7: me'i mtshams su zla ba'i nor bu lta bu'i dge slong bri'o //
T02D1270:61a-8: bden bral gyi mtshams su 'khor lo nam mkha'i mdog can bri'o //
T02D1270:61a-9: rlung gi mtshams su rdo rje sna tshogs kyi mdog can bri'o //
T02D1270:61a-10: de dag kyang padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i
T02D1270:61a-11: lte ba la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D1270:61a-12: bri bar bya'o // de dag la yang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i bdud bzhi gdan dang ldan pa'am /
T02D1270:61a-13: yang na mi ldan yang rung ste /
T02D1270:61a-14: de nas gzhan yang bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod pas /
T02D1270:61a-15: dbus kyi lte ba la padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D1270:61a-16: de'i lte ba la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gri gug nag po bri bar bya'o //
T02D1270:61a-17: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma la gri gug bzhi bri bar bya'o //
T02D1270:61a-18: de'i phyi rol gyi 'dab ma la byang shar la
T02D1270:61a-19: sogs pa'i mtshams su zla ba'i steng du gri gug
T02D1270:61a-20: bzhi bri'o // shar la sogs pa'i sgor zla ba dang padma la gri gug bzhi bri'o //
T02D1270:61a-21: shar dang nub kyi sgo 'gram du padma dang zla ba'i steng du gri gug gnyis bri'o //
T02D1270:61a-22: dkyil 'khor gyi tshon bkye ba'i dus su zhugs pa dang /
T02D1270:61a-24: rdo rje'i thig yid kyis nam mkha' la bteg ste /
T02D1270:61a-25: badzra be ga'i sngags brjod pa dang /
T02D1270:61a-26: lha'i rnam pa dang mi bral bar dgod par bya'o //
T02D1270:61a-27: de ltar ma yin na dam tshig nyams par bshad do //
T02D1270:61a-28: de nyid 'dus pa las 'di ltar gsungs te /
T02D1270:61a-30: rdo rje'i thig dang tshon rnams ni //
T02D1270:61a-31: sems kyis bteg nas spyod byas na //
T02D1270:61a-32: dam tshig nyams pas gos mi 'gyur //
T02D1270:61a-33: de nas dkyil 'khor phyi rim du g-yas dang g-yon
T02D1270:61a-34: skor gyi rim pas phyogs dang mtshams su ro skyes
T02D1270:61a-36: 'byung po la sogs dur khrod brgyad kyi bdag nyid bri'o //
T02D1270:61b-0: de la shar phyogs su tsha ba'i rigs @61b drag la gtum pa zhes bya ba'i dur khrod bri'o //
T02D1270:61b-1: lho phyogs su dum bu'i rigs 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya ba'i dur khrod bri'o //
T02D1270:61b-2: nub phyogs su 'dod pa'i rigs keng rus 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i dur khrod bri'o //
T02D1270:61b-3: byang phyogs su gsal shing la btsugs par bya ba'i
T02D1270:61b-4: rigs 'ur 'ur 'bar bas khyab pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D1270:61b-6: byang shar mtshams su shing la dpyangs pa'i rigs ha har dgod pa zhes bya ba'i dur khrod bri'o //
T02D1270:61b-7: me'i mtshams su phyed tsha ba'i rigs nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa bri'o //
T02D1270:61b-8: bden bral gyi mtshams su phyed dum bu'i rigs mun
T02D1270:61b-9: pa mi bzad pa zhes bya ba'i dur khrod du
T02D1270:61b-10: bri'o // rlung gi mtshams su sa 'og tu sbas
T02D1270:61b-11: pa'i rigs k'i li k'i li'i sgra sgrog pa bri'o
T02D1270:61b-12: bri'o // // de dag kyang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du shing rnams bri'o //
T02D1270:61b-21: sa las skyes pa shar la sogs pa'i rim pas bri'o //
T02D1270:61b-22: shing rnams kyi nang du shing gi bdag po gri gug dang /
T02D1270:61b-23: thod pa 'dzin pa 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o //
T02D1270:61b-24: de la glang po che'i gdong pa can ni glang po che'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1270:61b-25: ma he'i gdong pa can ni ma he'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1270:61b-26: chu srin gyi gdong pa can ni nya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1270:61b-27: gnod sbyin gyi gdong pa can ni mi'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1270:61b-28: ba glang gi gdod pa can ni khyu mchog gi tshogs kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1270:61b-29: ra'i gdong pa can ni ra'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1270:61b-30: srin po'i gdong pa can ni yi dags kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1270:61b-31: sha ra bha'i gdong pa can ni sha ra bha'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1270:61b-32: shing de dag gi rtsar ni phyogs skyong pa rnams
T02D1270:61b-33: ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin 'khor dang bcas pa rang
T02D1270:61b-34: gi rig ma la 'khyud par bzhugs so //
T02D1270:61b-35: de la dbang po ni sku mdog ser po rin
T02D1270:61b-36: po che'i dbu rgyan can sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis
T02D1270:61b-37: brgyan pa / phyag na rdo rje 'dzin zhing glang
T02D1270:61b-38: po dkar po la 'gying bag gi tshul gyis bzhugs
T02D1270:61b-39: brgyan pa / pa bri'o // gshin rje ni sku
T02D1270:61b-40: mdog nag po spyan me mdag gi phung po 'dra
T02D1270:61b-41: brgyan pa / pa bri'o // ba / smin ma
T02D1270:61b-42: dang dpral bar khro gnyer bsdus pa skra ser po
T02D1270:62a-0: phyag na dbyug pa dang rtse gsum @62a * //
T02D1270:62a-1: 'dzin cing ma he la khros pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa bri'o //
T02D1270:62a-2: chu bdag ni sku mdog dkar po gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa /
T02D1270:62a-3: sbrul gyi zhags pa dang dung 'dzin pa chu srin la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1270:62a-4: nor bdag ni sku mdog ser po gser gyi mdog
T02D1270:62a-5: can rin po che'i dbu rgyan can lcags kyu dang
T02D1270:62a-6: dbyug pa 'dzin pa gnod sbyin la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1270:62a-7: dbang ldan ni sku mdog dkar po ral pa'i thor tshugs can zla ba'i dbu rgyan /
T02D1270:62a-8: spyan gsum pa thod pa'i phreng ba can /
T02D1270:62a-13: kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa khyu mchog gi steng du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1270:62a-14: me lha ni sku mdog dmar po ral pa thor tshugs su byas pa /
T02D1270:62a-17: bgrang phreng dang skyabs sbyin dang gundhe dang /
T02D1270:62a-18: dbyug pa 'dzin pa ra'i steng na bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1270:62a-19: bden bral ni sku mdog sngon po dbu skra dmar po gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D1270:62a-20: thod pa'i phreng ba can gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa ro'i steng na bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1270:62a-21: rlung ni du ba'i mdog can rlung gi ras 'dzin pa /
T02D1270:62a-22: rin po che'i dbu rgyan can sha ba'i steng na bzhugs pa bri'o //
T02D1270:62a-23: de dag gi gnas su yang lha dang yi dags
T02D1270:62a-24: dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang 'byung po dang thub
T02D1270:62a-25: pa dang / srin po dang rlung bdag dang de dag gi tshogs kyis bskor ba bri'o //
T02D1270:62a-26: de'i g-yon du klu chen po brgyad gdengs ka dang bcas par bri'o //
T02D1270:62a-27: nor rgyas ni zla ba'i mdog can spyi bor autpala sngon pos mtshan pa gdengs ka dang bcas pa /
T02D1270:62a-28: padma ni dung gi mdog can dpal be'us mtshan pa'i gdengs ka can /
T02D1270:62a-29: stobs kyi rgyu ni d'ur ba lta bur mdog sngo
T02D1270:62a-30: ba rin po che gsum gyis mgrin par mtshan pa'o
T02D1270:62a-31: // 'jog po ni nyer ldan gyi me tog lta bu'i mdog can nor bu 'bar bas mtshan pa /
T02D1270:62a-32: padma chen po'i mdog kunda lta bur mtshungs pa rtse gsum gyis mtshan pa /
T02D1270:62a-33: hu lu hu lu ni shin tu gnag pa spyi bo mtshan mas mtshan pa /
T02D1270:62a-34: rigs ldan ni du ba'i mdog can zla ba'i nor bus mgrin pa mtshan pa /
T02D1270:62a-35: dung skyong ni gser gyi mdog can mgrin pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis mtshan pa bri'o //
T02D1270:62b-0: de dag gi rgyab tshogs su sprin rnams bri ste sgra grag pa ni mdog @62b nag po /
T02D1270:62b-2: rmugs pa ni gur gum gyi mdog can /
T02D1270:62b-3: mun pa ni sna tshogs pa'i mdog can /
T02D1270:62b-6: drag po ni snag tsha'i mdog can /
T02D1270:62b-8: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan du gyur pa thams cad kyis legs par spras te brgyan par bya'o //
T02D1270:62b-11: // / de la dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus su gang zhig gis bgegs brtsam pa dang /
T02D1270:62b-12: rang bzhin gyis bar chad du 'gyur ba spang ba'i phyir /
T02D1270:62b-13: sngon gyi rim pa bzhin dbang po la sogs pa'i
T02D1270:62b-14: phyogs skyong ba rnams la rim pa bzhin du phur
T02D1270:62b-15: bus gdab pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1270:62b-16: gal te dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su char dbab par gyur na /
T02D1270:62b-17: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas dur khrod kyi ras kyi steng du 'dug ste /
T02D1270:62b-18: gdug pa'i sems kyis sngags 'di bzlas so //
T02D1270:62b-20: pri y'a ya h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1270:62b-21: 'bar ba'i lta bas gyen du bltas nas thugs ka
T02D1270:62b-22: nas khro bo 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis nam mkha'i khams
T02D1270:62b-24: de'i 'od zer ye shes kyi mi lta bus sprin
T02D1270:62b-25: gyi tshogs yongs su gtor ba'i bsam pa dang ldan
T02D1270:62b-26: par bya'o // gal te me'i dgra byung bar gyur na /
T02D1270:62b-27: me'i steng du bam yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor kha dog dkar po /
T02D1270:62b-28: de'i steng du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte ba la /
T02D1270:62b-29: bhr'um yongs su gyur pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bsam /
T02D1270:62b-30: de'i lte ba la bhr'um las gyur pa'i ston ka'i
T02D1270:62b-31: ri bong can gyi dbus su bhr'um gyis byin gyis
T02D1270:62b-32: brlabs pa'i dbus su rgya mtsho bzhi chu bo chen
T02D1270:62b-33: po bzhi ma dros pa'i chu lta bu'i thugs ka'i
T02D1270:62b-34: sa bon gyi 'od zer sprin gyi tshogs lta bu
T02D1270:62b-35: byung ste nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa khyab par

T02D1270:62b-40: zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid lhag pa'i lha'am

T02D1270:63a-6: bya ba'i phyir chu lha la phur bus gdab par
T02D1270:63a-7: bya'o // bya'o // yang sngon bzhin du rdo rje
T02D1270:63a-8: ra ba la sogs pa rdo rjes gzhi'i bar du
T02D1270:63a-9: rim pas bsgom pa la khro bo'i lta bas phyogs

T02D1270:63a-36: aom he badzra dzra ra dzvar sha tr'am na na bhr'um h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1270:63a-37: sngags 'di khri phrag tu bzlas te /
T02D1270:63a-38: shin tu khros nas 'bras phub kyi phye la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1270:63a-39: des kyang bar chad zhi bar ma gyur na de la dug dang /
T02D1270:63a-43: ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /
T02D1270:63a-45: mi rus phye ma dang 'di dag ni smyi byed kyi khu bas sbrus te /
T02D1270:63a-46: bgegs kyi gzugs byas la rnga mo dang bong bu
T02D1270:63a-47: la sogs pa'i ril ma la dur khrod las byung
T02D1270:63a-49: mtshon rnon pos gzugs gtubs shing /
T02D1270:63a-50: aom sarba bi ghan'an m'a ra ya ghu: sv'a h'a /
T02D1270:63a-51: zhes pa'i sngags kyis 'bar ba'i mig dang /
T02D1270:63a-52: phyed krung gi gar gyis sngar bzhin sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1270:63a-53: de yang chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa tsam yin la /
T02D1270:63a-54: bgegs kyang rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i phyir /
T02D1270:63a-55: bdag med pa'i mes 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T02D1270:63a-56: bar chod bsal ba'i rim pa'o /
T02D1270:63a-58: // / de nas bar chad med par dkyil 'khor bri ba rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1270:63b-0: slob dpon khrus byas te dri zhim pos @63b byugs la /
T02D1270:63b-1: sna tshogs pa'i na bza' gyon zhing me tog gi phreng bas cod pan byas te /
T02D1270:63b-2: dkyil 'khor gyi pho brang du zhugs la stan mtho
T02D1270:63b-3: zhing 'jam pa la 'dug la rang lha'i rnal 'byor
T02D1270:63b-4: dang ldan pas tshon gyi lhag ma rnams yi ge
T02D1270:63b-5: gsum gyi mthar mu: dang ldan pas gshegs su gsol
T02D1270:63b-6: la tshon gyi snod rnams ni dben par gzhag go
T02D1270:63b-7: // dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyis rnams ni ba'i rnam lnga la sogs pas byugs nas /
T02D1270:63b-8: me tog gi tshom bu bkod pa la mar me'i phreng bas bskor te /
T02D1270:63b-9: khandha bindha la sogs pa'i spos phyogs thams cad gtams te /

T02D1270:63b-11: brang du rol mo'i tshogs kyi bum pa spyan drangs
T02D1270:63b-12: te / bskor ba gsum byas la rnam par rgyal
T02D1270:63b-13: ba'i bum pa dbus su bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o
T02D1270:63b-14: te / // goo r'i la sogs pa'i bum pa
T02D1270:63b-15: bzhi shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhir pho brang gi
T02D1270:63b-16: phyi rol du bzhugs par byas la /
T02D1270:63b-17: pukka s'i la sogs pa'i bum pa ni g-yon skor du mtshams bzhir gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1270:63b-18: gang ba'i bum pa bzhi yang phyogs bzhir mchod pa'i don du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1270:63b-19: las thams cad pa'i bum pas bgegs bskrad do //
T02D1270:63b-20: shar sgo'i lho phyogs su gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1270:63b-21: yang na mchod pa'i don du gang ba'i bum pa
T02D1270:63b-22: brgyad mchod pa'i phyag mtshan 'dzin par byin gyis brlabs
T02D1270:63b-23: la / shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang mtshams su dgod par bya'o //
T02D1270:63b-24: de ltar lha'i bum pa rnams kyi chu bdud rtsi
T02D1270:63b-25: lnga dang ldan pa'i padma'i snod du nyung du nyung
T02D1270:63b-26: du blugs te bdag nyid kyi mdun du gzhag go
T02D1270:63b-27: // bum pa dgod pa'i rim pa'o /
T02D1270:63b-29: // / de nas sngags pas dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs te /
T02D1270:63b-30: dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad thams cad tshogs par byas la /
T02D1270:63b-31: dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa byas te /
T02D1270:63b-32: de yang shin tu dag pa'i sems kyis dkyil 'khor
T02D1270:63b-33: gyi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub par
T02D1270:63b-34: bya'o // de yang rim pa 'di ltar 'byung ste /
T02D1270:63b-35: phyi'i rig ma lo bcu gsum lon pa'am /
T02D1270:63b-36: yang na nang gi rig ma dang bcas pas ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan par byas la /
T02D1270:64a-0: rdo rje dang padma bskyed pa'i sgras @64a * //
T02D1270:64a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug ste /
T02D1270:64a-2: thugs kar bcug ste 'od du zhu nas rdo rje'i lam du phyung ste /
T02D1270:64a-3: yum gyi padma'i gnas su phab la de bzhin gshegs
T02D1270:64a-4: pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin du phyogs bcur spros
T02D1270:64a-5: nas sems can gyi don ma lus par bya ste
T02D1270:64a-6: / blo dang ldan pas de nyid tshur bkug ste /
T02D1270:64a-7: dkyil 'khor gyi 'gram gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la /
T02D1270:64a-8: de dang mtshungs par phyin pa'i bgegs /
T02D1270:64a-9: aa sht'a na n'a'am h'um gi sgras yongs su bskrad de dkyil 'khor bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1270:64a-10: de nas bsang gtor la sogs pa byin te /
T02D1270:64a-11: dza: h'um bam ho: /'dis rim pa ji lta ba bzhin bkug la /
T02D1270:64a-12: dkyil 'khor gyi phyag mtshan la dgug pa dgug pa dang /
T02D1270:64a-16: de nas spyan dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1270:64a-17: yang bsang gtor la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas
T02D1270:64a-18: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las lha mo brgyad
T02D1270:64a-19: spros te / phyi dang gsang ba dang de kho na nyid kyi mchod pas mchod do //
T02D1270:64a-20: ras yug dang me tog gi phreng ba la sogs
T02D1270:64a-21: pa lha'i grangs su dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o
T02D1270:64a-23: khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rnams yongs su bskor //
T02D1270:64a-24: nyid kyi thugs kyi dgos pa 'grub pa ste //
T02D1270:64a-25: rgyud dang mi rgyu 'khor ba kun sgrub khyod //
T02D1270:64a-26: snying rje'i thugs kyis sems can byang chub mdzad //
T02D1270:64a-27: kun rdzob sgyu mas 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i yid //
T02D1270:64a-28: he ru ka dpal dgyes rdor thugs la bstod //
T02D1270:64a-29: de nas padma'i snod du bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga
T02D1270:64a-30: la man ngag ji lta ba bzhin byin gyis brlabs
T02D1270:64a-31: la / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la mchod par bya'o //
T02D1270:64a-32: dkyil 'khor dang dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid bdud rtsi
T02D1270:64a-33: des tshim par gyur nas bde ba chen po'i bdag
T02D1270:64a-35: rim pa so sor ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil
T02D1270:64a-36: 'khor gyi bdag pos lha thams cad kyi gsang sngags
T02D1270:64a-38: de nas sngags pa ji ltar 'byung ba'i las kyi
T02D1270:64a-39: rdo rje ma yin pa dkyil 'khor gyi pho brang
T02D1270:64a-40: nas bskrad la slob dpon gdugs dkar po dang /
T02D1270:64b-1: sgra'i tshogs la sogs pa'i rol mos yongs su bskor ba la phyir byung nas /
T02D1270:64b-3: rang gi bdun du zangs po che'am /
T02D1270:64b-4: smyug ma la sogs pa las byas pa'i snod du
T02D1270:64b-5: nya dang sha dang zan dang zho dang 'o ma
T02D1270:64b-7: chang dang chu dang chan dang 'bras rngos pa dang /
T02D1270:64b-8: til dang ri lu dang khu ba la sogs pa'i sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1270:64b-9: ston mo'i bye brag btung ba'i rnam pa dang /
T02D1270:64b-12: de dag gi rdzas kyis yongs su bkang la /
T02D1270:64b-13: mar me lnga dang bdud rtsi dang /
T02D1270:64b-15: me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yang bya'o //
T02D1270:64b-16: gzhan yang kha zas kyi tshogs ci 'byor pa tshogs par byas la /
T02D1270:64b-17: gal te ma 'byor na chu dang zan tsam las bya ste /
T02D1270:64b-18: thams cad tshogs par dmigs so //
T02D1270:64b-19: de ltar bltas nas 'bar ba la sogs pa'i ye
T02D1270:64b-20: shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi rim pas dag par bya'o
T02D1270:64b-21: // de'i rim pa ni 'di ltar 'byung ngo //
T02D1270:64b-22: mdun gyi nam mkha' la h'um sngon po yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje bsam par bya'o //
T02D1270:64b-23: de'i 'og tu a'a: dmar po yongs su gyur pa'i
T02D1270:64b-24: thod pa nang dmar po gnas pa bsam par bya'o
T02D1270:64b-25: // de'i dbus su aom dkar pos byin gyis brlabs
T02D1270:64b-26: pa'i bdud rtsi lnga'i bdag nyid bsam par byas nas
T02D1270:64b-27: // / de nas rdo rje padmo'i sbyor bas me
T02D1270:64b-28: sbar ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so
T02D1270:64b-29: // / // des rdzas rnams spros pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1270:64b-30: dros te khu bar gyur nas 'od zer dang ldan pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1270:64b-31: de nyid ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta
T02D1270:64b-32: bur gyur pa ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes
T02D1270:64b-33: so // de'i 'od zer phyogs bcur spros pas de
T02D1270:64b-34: bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa'i gzugs su gyur te
T02D1270:64b-35: so // / de dag gi thugs ka'i ye shes
T02D1270:64b-36: kyi sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi
T02D1270:64b-37: bdud rtsi bkug la bstim nas gnyis su med par
T02D1270:64b-38: byas pa ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1270:64b-39: ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1270:64b-40: de ltar ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid brlabs pa ni mchog gi bdud rtsir gyur te /
T02D1270:64b-41: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1270:65a-0: @65a * // de nas rang gi mdun gyi nam mkha' la chos
T02D1270:65a-1: kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su padma dmar po 'dab
T02D1270:65a-3: de la shar gyi 'dab ma la sogs pa bzhi la dbang po dang /
T02D1270:65a-7: byang shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la /
T02D1270:65a-11: rlung lha rnams h'um las skyes pa sku mdog sngon
T02D1270:65a-12: po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rdo rje dril bu'i
T02D1270:65a-13: phyag rgya dang ldan pas rang gi rig ma la
T02D1270:65a-14: 'khyud pa / phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa /
T02D1270:65a-15: brkyang bskum gyi gar gyis bzhugs pa mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa'i bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1270:65a-16: de'i steng du chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang du
T02D1270:65a-17: chud par zla ba dang nyi ma dang tshangs pa
T02D1270:65a-18: la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
T02D1270:65a-19: sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /
T02D1270:65a-23: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams 'dod pa'i lha'o //
T02D1270:65a-24: tshangs rigs dang tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang tshangs pa chen po ste bsam gtan dang po'o //
T02D1270:65a-27: 'od gsal ba ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'o //
T02D1270:65a-28: dge chung dang tshad med dge dang /
T02D1270:65a-29: dge rgyas ni bsam gtan gsum pa'o //
T02D1270:65a-30: sprin med dang bsod nams skyes dang 'bras bu che dang /
T02D1270:65a-35: 'og min gyi gnas te bsam gtan bzhi pa'o //
T02D1270:65a-36: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyis khams na gnas pa dang /
T02D1270:65a-37: 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa thams cad bkug nas lhan cig du zhu ste /
T02D1270:65a-38: aom las skyes pa sku mdog dkar po rdo rje
T02D1270:65a-39: dril bu dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya rang gi rig
T02D1270:65a-40: ma la 'khyud pa phyag drug dang ldan zhing brkyang
T02D1270:65a-42: rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan pa'o //
T02D1270:65a-43: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi padma'i rtsa bar nor rgyas dang /
T02D1270:65a-49: dung skyong la sogs pa dang /
T02D1270:65a-52: rnam par snang byed la sogs pa'i lha ma yin chen po rnams dang /
T02D1270:65b-0: sa'i @65b lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1270:65b-8: mnar med pa ste tsha ba'i dmyal ba la gnas pa rnams so //
T02D1270:65b-10: rab tu chu bur can dang /
T02D1270:65b-16: padma chen po ste grang ba'i dmyal ba rnams so //
T02D1270:65b-19: rigs la gnas pa la sogs pa'i dmyal ba'i bye brag ji snyed yod pa dang /
T02D1270:65b-20: yi dags dang dud 'gror bcas pa bkug ste /
T02D1270:65b-21: rnam par byang ba'i cho ga byas la /
T02D1270:65b-22: a'a: dmar po las gyur ba'i klu rnams ni zhal
T02D1270:65b-23: gcig phyag gnyis pa rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya
T02D1270:65b-24: dang ldan pa rang gi rig ma la 'khyud pa

T02D1270:65b-26: snang ba mtha' yas kyis dbu brgyan par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1270:65b-27: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis sna tshogs pa'i
T02D1270:65b-28: gos dang dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes nas
T02D1270:65b-29: / me tog gi phreng bas chod pan byas pa /
T02D1270:65b-30: rna ba la autpala la dang /
T02D1270:65b-36: gser dngul la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan par bya'o //
T02D1270:65b-37: de nas sa phyogs su dri dang ba'i rnam lngas byugs la /
T02D1270:65b-38: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa mu khyud dang bcas pa chos 'byung gi gnas su chud par bya'o //
T02D1270:65b-39: shar dang byang shar gyi mtshams su chos 'byung gi

T02D1270:65b-42: klu rnams bkod pa'i gnas so //
T02D1270:65b-43: nub kyi char ni phyogs skyong gi bdag nyid blta bar byas la /
T02D1270:65b-44: de nas goo r'i la sogs pa'i sbyor bas dgug
T02D1270:65b-45: pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du
T02D1270:65b-46: ste / bsang gtor la sogs pa sngon du 'gro
T02D1270:65b-47: bas gtor ma'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la dbul
T02D1270:65b-48: ste / bar bya'o // rdo rje kha dbye ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas sngags kyis dbul /
T02D1270:66a-8: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'ad+ya
T02D1270:66a-9: nu tpa nna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a
T02D1270:66a-10: h'a / de dag gi ljags la h'um dkar po
T02D1270:66a-11: yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i spu gus bdud
T02D1270:66a-12: rtsi 'dren pa'i rlung gi bdag nyid du blta'o //
T02D1270:66a-13: de nas zangs dung la sogs pa'i sgra dang ldan pas mngon par phyogs te /
T02D1270:66a-14: gtor ma las khyor ba gsum blangs te /
T02D1270:66a-15: sa de nyid du bzhag pa la lha la sogs
T02D1270:66a-16: pa mchog gi bdud rtsi thob pas shin tu tshim
T02D1270:66a-17: par 'gyur te / bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid du bltas te /
T02D1270:66a-18: gtor ma de shing rta'am khur ba'am /
T02D1270:66a-19: ji lta ba'i sbyor bas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1270:66a-20: skabs de nyid du phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa rnams gtor mas dgyes shing tshim par gyur nas /
T02D1270:66a-21: sgrub pa pos ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub byin
T02D1270:66a-22: par bsams la bsang gtor la sogs pa'i mchod pas
T02D1270:66a-23: mchod de / thod pa'i bdud rtsi lngas bsang gtor byas la tshig 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D1270:66a-24: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1270:66a-25: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grus stsol //
T02D1270:66a-26: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
